name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications in dynamic environments. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Scala**, with solid skills in **TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks like **React** and **Spring Boot**. Experienced in deploying solutions using **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and configuration management with **Terraform**. Proven ability to implement CI/CD practices with **Jenkins** and **Spinnaker**, and skilled in using **Kafka** for event streaming.

Expertise in building and managing cloud-native applications while ensuring adherence to compliance standards. Strong experience in Agile methodologies, facilitating effective **teamwork** and **communication** across cross-functional teams. Adept at leveraging **predictive analytics**, automation, and real-time processing capabilities in projects, enhancing organizational effectiveness.
